original_text: And awe came upon every soul, and many wonders and signs were being done through the apostles.
korean_text: 사람마다 두려워하는데 사도들로 말미암아 기사와 표적이 많이 나타나니

sentences.original_text: And awe came upon every soul
and many wonders and signs were being done through the apostles
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사도들을 통해 많은 기사와 표적들이 행해지고 있었다
